Articles.Content:
Jeb, Bill and Bob are on their way back to KSC after a long mission all around the system. They will be dropping in shortly.

We are going to throw them a surprise welcome back party.

As such, we need to decorate the KSC ready for an all night party.

The challenge, Light up the KSC brightly and colourfully.

Rules:

No mods.

No infinite rcs, or fuels of any kind.

No custom parts.

Must be colourful and spectacular

Bonus points:

Spectacular fireworks

Technological flairs

Artistic flairs

Colourful flybys

Impressive constructions

Points deducted for eyesores!

I still have some work to do but this should give you some inspiration.
Does it have to be one craft?

nope, there are no restrictions on how you do it other than what is stated. I have 7 buggies and one tower with light arrays on so far. Except I need to edit them as they are colour combining to create too much hot pink...
That is the coolest picture I have ever seen in KSP! Imma go beat it!

Un-se, un-se, un-se

The first thing I did in arm. Too many colours made everything white:(
